subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Be inform that because of irregularities in the past from officials
handling this payment through Central Bank Nigeria  by wire transfer
which they do have problem with your fund transfer.
All payment will be paid into your company account if you can follow
our payment office at lutanist Turkey that will handle your direct
wire transfer into your account without delay.
Sir, All arrangement has be put in place reconfirm your total amount
of your contract fund  and your full banking details with your
contract number for me to input it into computer payment information
system from here with your direct cell phone for easy communication
i will be awaiting for your details information.
Regards.
Mr Amos Adams

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Adams,

Thank you for your email. However, I must inform you that I am not expecting any contract fund and I believe there may be a misunderstanding or mistake. Could you please provide more details about the contract and the payment?

Best wishes,
Kristen
